00025 namespace ipl{ // use namespace ipl
00026 
00037 template<class T>
00038 class CLine2D
00039 {
00040         public: // attributes
00042                 CPoint2D<T> m_P;
00044                 CVector2D<T> m_Dir;
00045         public: // methods
00047                 CLine2D();
00052                 CLine2D(CPoint2D<T> P, CVector2D<T> Dir);
00054                 CLine2D(const CLine2D<T>& Line2D);
00057                 CLine2D<T>& operator=(const CLine2D<T>& Line2D);
00060                 inline const CVector2D<T>& GetDir() const;
00063                 inline const CPoint2D<T>& GetPoint() const;
00068                 bool Intersect(const CLine2D<T>& L, CPoint2D<T>& Q);
00074                 bool Set(const CPoint2D<T>& P, const CVector2D<T>& Dir);
00075 };
00076 
00077 template<class T>
00078 inline const CVector2D<T>& CLine2D<T>::GetDir() const
00079 {
00080         return m_Dir;
00081 }
00082 
00083 template<class T>
00084 inline const CPoint2D<T>& CLine2D<T>::GetPoint() const
00085 {
00086         return m_P;
00087 }
